description: Import map for 9th.js - WebGL 1.0/2.0 compatible 3D library

comments.usage: Add this import map to your HTML to enable cleaner imports like: import { WebGLRenderer } from '9th.js';
comments.webgl: All builds support WebGL 1.0 with automatic fallback detection and WebGL 2.0 optimizations where available
comments.modular: Use 9th.js/core for minimal builds, 9th.js/full for complete functionality, or 9th.js/experimental for bleeding-edge features
comments.cdn: For CDN usage, import from '9th.js' directly or use the UMD builds in dist/umd/
